sourcing.instructions: B: Chemical supply store, 3: Local hardware store, C: Online specialty shop, Pr: Laboratory supply company, Ru: Precious metal dealer
steps: B: Chemical supply store, 3: Local hardware store, C: Online specialty shop, Pr: Laboratory supply company, Ru: Precious metal dealer

1. Measure B (30 g) and C (10 g) accurately. 2. In a clean mixing bowl, combine B and C thoroughly. 3. Gradually add 3 (15 g) into the mixture while stirring continuously. 4. Next, add Pr (20 g) and mix until homogeneous. 5. Finally, incorporate Ru (40 g) slowly, ensuring even distribution.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure B (30 g) and C (10 g) accurately. 2. In a clean mixing bowl, combine B and C thoroughly. 3. Gradually add 3 (15 g) into the mixture while stirring continuously. 4. Next, add Pr (20 g) and mix until homogeneous. 5. Finally, incorporate Ru (40 g) slowly, ensuring even distribution.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed composition into a heat-resistant container. 2. Heat the mixture to 1200°C in a furnace. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure proper fusion of materials.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed composition into a heat-resistant container. 2. Heat the mixture to 1200°C in a furnace. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure proper fusion of materials.

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to drop naturally to 400°C. 2. Once at 400°C, remove the container and let it cool to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the furnace and allow the temperature to drop naturally to 400°C. 2. Once at 400°C, remove the container and let it cool to room temperature (approximately 1-2 hours).

steps: 1. After cooling, remove the solid sample from the container. 2. Use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth the edges and surfaces. 3. Optionally, apply a sealing agent to enhance surface finish and protect the material.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. After cooling, remove the solid sample from the container. 2. Use fine-grit sandpaper to smooth the edges and surfaces. 3. Optionally, apply a sealing agent to enhance surface finish and protect the material.
